game_mode_info: Magos Lite lets you create two different types of game. In the first, the player's character flies in the air. In the second, the player can make the character jump off the ground. In both types of game you can set the game mode, which is what the player needs to do to complete the game. In time mode, you set the duration of the game; the player will need to last that whole period to win. In distance mode, you set how far the player will need to travel to win. In survival mode, the game gets harder as it goes along because hazards appear more frequently. And you can set how much harder the game will get as it progresses.
player_info: Select an icon for the player to control in the game
background_info: Use these controls to create a background for your game. Behind the action there is a set of moving scenery panels that overlap to form the scene. If you want to, you can include up to three of these. During the game they will move from right to left at different speeds and this will make it look like your character is moving forwards.
separate multiple right and wrong answer: separate multiple correct and wrong responses with comma
memory_match_info: Memory is a maths game. The player is given a starting addition and has to catch the answer when it appears in the game. Catching that target generates the next target, which is the number just caught plus the second number in the initial addition. In this way a sequence of maths targets progressively appears for the player to catch. Insert here the first and second number that together form the starting addition.
match_info: The aim in this mission is to find and 'catch' words that go together in some way. At the start of the game, a starting word is shown at the top of the screen. When the game commences, different words appear and move towards the player, together with other game objects to collect or avoid. The player has to identify the word(s) that match the starting word in some way and catch them as they pass on the screen. This will win the player points but catching or bumping into any wrong words will lose the player points. You can include more than one match in your game. When the player completes the first match, the next one immediately appears.
Denominator has to be equal or greater t: Denominator has to be equal to or greater than numerator!
collectibles_info: Collectibles are moving elements that the player tries to collect in order to win game points. To collect them, the player has to bump into them as they approach. Use these controls to add collectibles to your game and to fix the frequency of their appearance.
Lose life if player collides with hazard: Does collision with a hazard make the player lose a life?
hazards_info: Hazards are moving elements that the player needs to avoid. If an approaching hazard hits the player, game points are lost. Use these controls to add hazards to your game and to fix the frequency of their appearance.  You can also decide whether the player will lose a life when hitting a hazard makes (see Powerups).
speed_info: Use these controls to set the speed of collectibles and hazards. Changing the speeds makes the game easier or more difficult to play.
points_info: Use these controls to fix the points earned from collectibles and points lost from hazards.
powerups_info: Use these controls to add powerups to the game. These can make play easier or harder while the game is running. If you select Extra Lives, moving heart symbols will appear in the game every 20-30 seconds. If the player catches one, his/her reserve of extra lives (shown in the top-left corner) will increase by one. This give the player a chance to survive for a longer time in the game. If you select Turbo Speed, a special turbo symbol will appear in the game. If the player collides with one of these, the whole game will immediately run faster and thus become more difficult to play.  The speed will return to normal when the player manages to catch another Turbo symbol.
stars_info: Use these controls to fix  how many points the player needs to earn star rewards. In time and distance mode the player has to clear the level (e.g. travel a required distance)to earn stars.
instructions_info: Write the instructions for your game here. Try to make them as clear as possibile. Be sure to describe the main aim of the game.
my_games_info: You can change the game you are editing.
